overview: Award winning director, Sam No, returns with Massive Facials! Elegant Angel proudly presents an assemblage of the biggest stars in porn, Jenna Haze, AVN - performer of the year - Sasha Grey, Rebeca Linares, Dakoda Brookes, Courtney James, and Bobbi Starr. Watches these superstars get smothered in massive amounts of sperm!
title: Massive Facials
